snippet: Jonathan Tropper’s sixth novel is about Drew Silver, a divorced part-time drummer in an over-the-hill rock band, supporting himself partly by selling specimens to a sperm bank.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book One Last Thing Before I Go by Jonathan Tropper.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Tropper’s sixth novel is about Drew Silver, a divorced part-time drummer in an over-the-hill rock band, supporting himself partly by selling specimens to a sperm bank.

headline.seo: ‘One Last Thing Before I Go’ by Jonathan Tropper
headline.main: A Man’s Humdrum Life Suddenly Turns Potent
headline.print_headline: A Man’s Humdrum Life Suddenly Turns Potent
